title: Kini Murimurivalu
text:
Kini Murimurivalu (born 15 May 1989) is a Fijian <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> footballer. He currently plays for <a href="Leicester%20Tigers">Leicester Tigers</a> having signed in July 2020 and the <a href="Fiji%20national%20rugby%20union%20team">Fiji national rugby union team</a> and usually plays as a Wing or <a href="Fullback%20%28rugby%20union%29">fullback</a>. 
He was part of the <a href="Fiji%20national%20rugby%20union%20team">Fiji</a> team at the <a href="2011%20Rugby%20World%20Cup">2011 Rugby World Cup</a> where he played in three matches, he made his international debut in 2011.
